books.title: Bambi
books.author: Felix Salten
books.summary: A roe deer learns the rules of the forest and how to survive in a world inhabited by men as he grows to maturity.

books.title: Bulldog Drummond
books.author: H. C. McNeile
books.summary: A demobilized officer places a newspaper advert for adventure, and its response leads him to discover a conspiracy.

books.title: Struggles and Triumphs
books.author: P. T. Barnum
books.summary: The world’s greatest showman tells the story of his life.

books.title: Recollections of Full Years
books.author: Helen Herron Taft
books.summary: Helen Herron Taft, wife of William Howard Taft, the twenty-seventh President of the United States, recalls her life married to one of America’s most influential political figures.

books.title: The House of Arden
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Two children, with the aid of a magical white mole, travel into the past in search of their family’s long-lost treasure.

books.title: Fanny’s First Play
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: A young woman writes a play to shock her father, in which two respectable families deal with their with disreputable children.

books.title: Coriolanus
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A famous Roman general wants to run for consul.

books.title: The Blazing World
books.author: Margaret Cavendish
books.summary: A young lady is abducted and finds herself the empress of a strange new world.

books.title: Tombstone
books.author: Walter Noble Burns
books.summary: An embellished retelling of the town of Tombstone, Arizona, during its heyday in the late 19th century, featuring famous heroes and outlaws of the American Old West.

books.title: The Case of Charles Dexter Ward
books.author: H. P. Lovecraft
books.summary: A young scholar delves into his family past and finds more than he bargained for.

books.title: Running a Thousand Miles for Freedom
books.author: William Craft
books.summary: The authors escape from slavery by posing as a slaveowner and his slave.

books.title: The Powerhouse
books.author: John Buchan
books.summary: A secret criminal organization is uncovered after an M.P.’s friend goes missing.

books.title: Histories
books.author: Herodotus
books.summary: Herodotus recounts the history and geography of the ancient world.

books.title: A Voyage to Arcturus
books.author: David Lindsay
books.summary: One man’s journey through a psychedelic alien landscape of philosophy, religion, life, and death.

books.title: Spoon River Anthology
books.author: Edgar Lee Masters
books.summary: A collection of short poems recounting the lives and deaths of the residents of a small Illinois town.

books.title: The Surprising Adventures of Baron Munchausen
books.author: Rudolph Erich Raspe
books.summary: The legendary Baron Munchausen’s tall tales of wonder and adventure.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Henry Kuttner
books.summary: A collection of short fiction by Henry Kuttner, ordered by date of original publication.

books.title: John Silence Stories
books.author: Algernon Blackwood
books.summary: A physician turned detective uses his psychic abilities to solve the strange cases presented to him.

books.title: Paradise Lost
books.author: John Milton
books.summary: A dramatic imagining in blank verse of the rebellion of Satan against God, Satan’s overthrow, and the Fall of Man.

books.title: Roughing It
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: Mark Twain’s semiautobiographical account of his travel across the United States.
